verses.name: Jeremiah 16:6
verses.text: Both the great and the small shall die in this land: they shall not be buried, neither shall men lament for them, nor cut themselves, nor make themselves bald for them:

verses.name: Jeremiah 16:7
verses.text: Neither shall men tear themselves for them in mourning, to comfort them for the dead; neither shall men give them the cup of consolation to drink for their father or for their mother.

verses.name: Jeremiah 16:8
verses.text: Thou shalt not also go into the house of feasting, to sit with them to eat and to drink.
